an3.17:1.1: “These three things, mendicants, lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, and hurting both.
an3.17:1.3: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.17:1.4: These are three things that lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, and hurting both.
an3.17:2.1: These three things, mendicants, don’t lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, or hurting both.
an3.17:2.3: Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.17:2.4: These are three things that don’t lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, or hurting both.”
